summary: adds the custom voiced female follower
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/67034-0-1434673163.jpg[/img][/size]

[size=3]This mod adds the custom voiced female follower.[/size]
[size=3]This is standalone. So you can use this with no problem whatever body types you're using.[/size]



[b][size=5][Follower detail][/size][/b]

[size=3]Name: Eloise[/size]
[size=3]Level: 10 - No limit[/size]
[size=3]Voice: Custom voiced (Korean)[/size]
[size=3]Body: UNP[/size]
[size=3]Weight: 0[/size]
[size=3]Location: Drunken Huntsman, Whiterun[/size]
[size=3]Combat Style: Archery and Dual weapons[/size]
[size=3]Perks:[/size]
[size=3]Stealth, Light Foot, Agile Defender[/size]
[size=3]Overdraw, Critical Shot, Ranger, Quick Shot[/size]
[size=3]Armsman, Dual Flurry, Dual Savagery[/size]
[size=3]ETC: Marriage impossible, Essential, Custom outfit[/size]



[b][size=5][Recommended Mods][/size][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457]Face Light by tktk1[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303]Female Facial Animation by nao4288[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster[/url]



[b][size=5][Credits][/size][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951]Enhanced Character Edit by tktk[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female by dimon99[/url]
[url=http://luminalion.tumblr.com]Girl of Innocence by Lumina[/url]
[size=2]KS Hairdos[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty by LogRaam[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54416]Eye Normal Map Fix by Mr. Dave[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61691]Penobscot War Bow by FrankFamily[/url]
[size=2]Denim onepiece by amnesiaco[/size]
[size=2]Bubble pop clothes by Gomachaeum[/size]
[size=2]LOL korean voices by Riot games[/size]



[b][size=5][Change Log][/size][/b]
[size=3]
v1.1 Bug fixs[/size][size=3]


[/size]
[b][size=5][Video][/size][/b]


[youtube]EwNPsokZ4LI[/youtube]
[size=3]by MxR[/size]

[size=3]Thank you for the video.[/size]
